structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM UNINCORPORATED NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION ACT

law.catch_line: Liability for association debts and obligations.

text.section:
If the association has filed a certificate of association with the Secretary of State, a debt, obligation, or other liability of an unincorporated nonprofit association, whether arising in contract, tort, or otherwise accruing or arising after the filing of the certificate is:
Solely the debt, obligation, or other liability of the association; and
Not a debt, obligation, or other liability of a member or manager solely because the member acts as a member or the manager acts as a manager.
Subsection (1) of this section shall not affect the liability of a member or manager of an association for his or her own negligence, wrongful acts, or misconduct.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 17, effective June 24, 2015.
